channel.title: Randomly my server wont work
channel.description:
okay, i compile the server, no errors, nothing wrong. So i run the server. and it gives me all this random stuff and wont let me on the server. This is what it says.
[code]Starting Tyrael-scape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 c:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\jre\lib\rt.jar: error reading zip file Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: sun/net/www/protocol/ http/AuthCacheValue at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.<inti><HttpURLConnection. java:225> at sun.net.www.protocol.http.Handler.openConnection<Handler.java:44> at sun.net.www.protocol.http.Handler.openConnection<Handler.java:39> at java.net.URL.openConnection<URL.java:945> at ServerGUI.downloadFile<serverGUI.java:353> at ServerGUI. Update<ServerGUI.java:338> at ServerGUI.process<ServerGUI.java:300> at server.main<server.java:49>[/code] Any clue on what to do? Thanks tyrael

item.title: Randomly my server wont work
item.dc:creator: @P3rscape P3rscape
item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

if that doesnt work, open notepad and put this in:

@echo off title YOUR SERVER NAME "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause if that doesnt work change jdk 1.5.0 to jdk1.6.0

Hope this heled

Read full topic

item.title: Randomly my server wont work
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

okay, i compile the server, no errors, nothing wrong. So i run the server.
and it gives me all this random stuff and wont let me on the server.
This is what it says.

Starting Tyrael-scape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 c:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\jre\lib\rt.jar: error reading zip file Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: sun/net/www/protocol/ http/AuthCacheValue at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.<inti><HttpURLConnection. java:225> at sun.net.www.protocol.http.Handler.openConnection<Handler.java:44> at sun.net.www.protocol.http.Handler.openConnection<Handler.java:39> at java.net.URL.openConnection<URL.java:945> at ServerGUI.downloadFile<serverGUI.java:353> at ServerGUI. Update<ServerGUI.java:338> at ServerGUI.process<ServerGUI.java:300> at server.main<server.java:49>
Any clue on what to do?
Thanks tyrael
